程序包 starray.java.mono4j

类 MonoDomain

java.lang.Object
com.sun.jna.Pointer
starray.java.mono4j.MonoObject
starray.java.mono4j.MonoDomain
public class MonoDomain extends MonoObject
Mono 应用程序域 Mono application domain

提供域的初始化、获取和程序集加载功能 Provides domain initialization, retrieval and assembly loading functionality
